test-case.name: fn-hours-from-duration1args-1

test-case.description: Evaluates The "hours-from-duration" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:dayTimeDuration(upper bound)

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDurationFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `hours-from-duration()`.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDurationFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `hours-from-duration((), "Wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDurationFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(hours-from-duration(()))`.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDurationFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `hours-from-duration(()) instance of xs:integer?`.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDurationFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `hours-from-duration(xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT8H2M1.03S")) eq 8`.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDurationFunc-6
test-case.description: Simple test invoking hours-from-duration() on a negative duration.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDurationFunc-7
test-case.description: Simple test invoking days-from-hours() on an negative xs:duration.

test-case.name: cbcl-hours-from-duration-001
test-case.description: test fn:hours-from-duration on xs:yearMonthDuration
